dt: {bc}a divine imparting of knowledge or power {bc}{sx|inspiration||}

et: borrowed from Latin {it}afflātus,{/it} literally, "emission of breath, exhalation," from {it}afflāre{/it} "to breathe on or toward, inspire" (from {it}ad-{/it} {et_link|ad-|ad-} + {it}flāre{/it} "to blow, breathe") + {it}-tus,{/it} suffix of verbal action {ma}{mat|blow:1|}{/ma}
shortdef: a divine imparting of knowledge or power : inspiration
